description:
Gently cleanse and care for your skin with Anihana’s Soap Bar Peach Smoothie.
This handcrafted soap is enriched with hydrating coconut oil to nourish the skin, while coconut-derived glycerine helps to retain moisture. With a scent that is reminiscent of fresh, juicy peaches, you’ll love the way this lathers on your skin! 
Containing no SLS, SLES or parabens, this soap bar helps you enjoy those simple moments of relaxation and bliss that are crucial to your mental health and wellbeing! 
Key benefits: 
● Safe and non-toxic - free from SLS, SLES or parabens
● Plant-based - formulated with clean and safe ingredients derived from nature
● Recyclable cardboard packaging
Anihana is a New Zealand natural beauty brand that offers a range of vibrant body and hair care products designed to make you relax and feel good. Safe and non-toxic with no plastic for landfill, their products are cruelty-free and made from clean and natural ingredients.
name: Anihana 120G
